alert.note: Alert for Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 3:15PM EDT until April 19 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Schuyler, Steuben, Onondaga, Yates, Seneca and Southern Cayuga counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Heavy, wet snow could cause scattered power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow totals will be highly elevation dependent, with the heaviest totals across the higher terrain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Yates
